name.jp: 鍛冶屋の心得・アクセサリー編

description.en: This scroll prevents the loss of an accessory when an upgrade fails. To use, place scroll in the appropriate box on the Accessory Upgrade Menu before attempting the upgrade. The scroll is consumed during the upgrade process.
description.ar: This scroll prevents the loss of an accessory when an upgrade fails. To use, place scroll in the appropriate box on the Accessory Upgrade Menu before attempting the upgrade. The scroll is consumed during the upgrade process.
description.br: Evita que acessórios sejam destruídos caso um fortalecimento falhe. Para usar, coloque o pergaminho na caixa apropriada no menu de Fortalecimento de Acessórios antes de iniciar a tentativa de aprimoramento. O pergaminho é consumido no processo.
description.cns: 这个卷轴防止在精炼失败时首饰损失。若要使用，请在尝试精炼之前，在首饰精炼菜单的相应框中放置卷轴。卷轴在精炼过程中被消耗掉。
description.de: Diese Rolle schützt deinen Schmuck vor der Zerstörung wenn ein Upgrade fehlschlägt.
description.fi: This scroll prevents the loss of an accessory when an upgrade fails. To use, place scroll in the appropriate box on the Accessory Upgrade Menu before attempting the upgrade. The scroll is consumed during the upgrade process.
description.fil: This scroll prevents the loss of an accessory when an upgrade fails. To use, place scroll in the appropriate box on the Accessory Upgrade Menu before attempting the upgrade. The scroll is consumed during the upgrade process.
description.fr: Parchemin protégeant vos accessoires lors d'une amélioration.
description.id: Gulir ini mencegah hilangnya aksesori saat pemutakhiran gagal. Untuk menggunakan, tempatkan gulir di kotak yang sesuai pada Menu Peningkatan Aksesori sebelum mencoba peningkatan. Gulir dikonsumsi selama proses peningkatan.
description.it: This scroll prevents the loss of an accessory when an upgrade fails. To use, place scroll in the appropriate box on the Accessory Upgrade Menu before attempting the upgrade. The scroll is consumed during the upgrade process.
description.jp: アクセサリー精錬に失敗してもアクセサリーの消失を1回だけ防止してくれる巻物。アクセサリー強化メニューのボックスに巻物をセットします。成功・失敗に関わらず消費します。（通称: AProtect）
description.kr: 액세서리 제련 도중 실패시 아이템 소실을 방지합니다. 사용하려면 제련하기 전에 스크롤을 제련 메뉴의 상자에 넣고 사용하십시오. 스크롤은 제련 과정에서 소모됩니다.
description.nl: This scroll prevents the loss of an accessory when an upgrade fails. To use, place scroll in the appropriate box on the Accessory Upgrade Menu before attempting the upgrade. The scroll is consumed during the upgrade process.
description.pl: This scroll prevents the loss of an accessory when an upgrade fails. To use, place scroll in the appropriate box on the Accessory Upgrade Menu before attempting the upgrade. The scroll is consumed during the upgrade process.
description.ru: Одноразовый. Предотвращает поломку бижутерии при неудачной попытке усилить ее. Используйте свиток перед тем, как усиливать предмет.
description.sp: Este pergamino evita la pérdida de un accesorio cuando falla la mejora. Para usarlo, coloca el pergamino en la casilla correspondiente en el Menú de Mejora de Accesorios antes de intentar la mejora. El pergamino se consume en el proceso.
description.sw: This scroll prevents the loss of an accessory when an upgrade fails. To use, place scroll in the appropriate box on the Accessory Upgrade Menu before attempting the upgrade. The scroll is consumed during the upgrade process.
description.th: คัมภีร์นี้ช่วยป้องกันการสูญหายของอุปกรณ์เสริมเมื่อการอัพเกรดล้มเหลว ในการใช้งาน ให้วางคัมภีร์ไปที่กล่องที่เหมาะสมบนเมนูอัพเกรดอุปกรณ์เสริมก่อนที่จะพยายามอัพเกรด
description.tw: 此卷軸可防止升級失敗時配件不見。要使用，請在升級之前將卷軸放在升級選單上的相對應框中。升級過程中會消耗卷軸。
description.vi: Cuộn này ngăn chặn việc mất phụ kiện khi nâng cấp không thành công. Để sử dụng, hãy đặt cuộn vào ô thích hợp trên Menu Nâng cấp Phụ kiện trước khi thử nâng cấp. Cuộn giấy được sử dụng trong quá trình nâng cấp.
